items.name: rusty lever
items.description: A heavy iron lever, coated in rust. Looks like it fits into some kind of mechanism.

usability.effectDescription: You slide the rusty lever into the slot. With a grating screech, you pull it downwards. A loud *CLUNK* echoes from another room!

items.name: lever slot
items.description: A heavy-duty slot mechanism is embedded in the wall, missing its lever.

items.name: empty wine bottle
items.description: An old glass bottle covered in dust. It's empty but sturdy enough to use as a blunt tool.

items.name: sturdy plank
items.description: A solid wooden plank, slightly cracked but still strong enough to use for crossing gaps or as leverage.

rooms.name: Dark Cellar
rooms.description: Cold, damp air clings to your skin. Shadows flicker along the stone walls.

rooms.name: Wine Rack Corner
rooms.description: This corner holds a dusty, old wine rack filled with shattered bottles and cobwebs.

rooms.name: Under the Stairs
rooms.description: Directly beneath the rickety wooden staircase, the air is thick with dust and decay.

rooms.name: Gate Control Area
rooms.description: You are in a small, cramped area near the base of the main stairs. A heavy iron gate blocks passage north.

rooms.name: Upstairs Landing
rooms.description: You've passed the gate and reached the landing. Dust motes float in the faint light from above.
